Description:
Detects default CSExec service filename which indicates CSExec service installation and execution

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: CSExec Service File Creation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where filepath like '%\csexecsvc.exe'
